thread.title: Fabulous girls trip
thread.title_full: Fabulous girls trip - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Melissa P
title: Fabulous girls trip
text:
Every part of our stay at The Viceroy was enjoyable. The staff were friendly and incredibly helpful, nothing was too much of a bother. It was a good size room with quite a big 3 way bathroom for a NY hotel room/suite. Would stay again as it is quite central to most popular spots and if not Uber was a call away.
Room Tip: We were on lower floor rooms and didn't have noise problems. See more room tips
